alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 12:59PM CDT until July 05 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Northwestern Stephenson County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waddams Grove, or 16 miles southwest of Monroe, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lena, Warren, Winslow, Nora, Buena Vista, Oneco, Orangeville, Kent, Waddams Grove, Lake Le-Aqua- na State Park, Mc Connell, Apple River Canyon State Park and Jo Daviess County Fairgrounds. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
